resources.author: simon
resources.post: Dear Dan. The crusifixion  part was a humorous joke that was sent out to a handful of Christians and added on my  Christian channel in which you have now sent all over the world. As certain people have no sense of humour I have to remove it. May God still bless you.
resources.title: Simon Brown Video of Barrie Schwortz at  Jalsa SalanaÂ UK
